titleStmt.title: Sermons of the Right Reuerend Father in God Miles Smith, late Lord Bishop of Glocester. Transcribed out of his originall manuscripts, and now published for the common good
Sermons
titleStmt.author: Smith, Miles, d. 1624.
Prior, Thomas, b. 1585 or 6.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Elizabeth Allde for Robert Allot, dwelling at the Blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "A sermon at the funerall of the Right Reuerend Father in God, Miles, late Lord Bishop of Gloucester .. by Thomas Prior" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Some print faded and show-through; some leaves stained.
